import { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { ScriptsContext } from "../../context/ScriptsContext"; import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext"; const CenterContent = () => { const [editButton, setEditButton] = useState(false); const { changeModal, openModal } = useContext(ScriptsContext); const { userAllDetails } = useContext(ApiContext); const [title, setTitle] = useState(); const [description, setDescription] = useState(); const [location, setLocation] = useState(); const [github, setGithub] = useState(); const [job, setJob] = useState(); const [foto, setFoto] = useState(); const onChangeButton = () => { const bodyFormData = new FormData(); bodyFormData.append("title", title); bodyFormData.append("description", description); bodyFormData.append("location", location); bodyFormData.append("github", github); bodyFormData.append("job", job); bodyFormData.append("image", foto) console.log(foto) }; //////////////////////////////////////////// useEffect(() => { setTitle(userAllDetails.title ? userAllDetails.title : ""); setDescription( userAllDetails.description ? userAllDetails.description : "" ); setLocation(userAllDetails.locations ? userAllDetails.locations : ""); setGithub(userAllDetails.github ? userAllDetails.github : ""); setJob(userAllDetails.job ? userAllDetails.job : ""); setFoto(userAllDetails.image ? userAllDetails.image : ""); }, [userAllDetails]); return (
{!editButton ? (!foto && userAllDetails.image !== foto.name ? : ) : ( )}

{!editButton ? ( userAllDetails.github ? ( userAllDetails.github.split("/").pop() ) : ( "Github" ) ) : ( setGithub(e.target.value)} type="text" name="github" placeholder="Github" /> )}
